mapper.select: SELECT r.release_order_code , r.release_code , r.warehouse_code , r.product_code , p.product_name , r.release_order_quantity , r.release_recipient_name , r.release_recipient_address , r.release_recipient_phone , r.shoppingmall_user_id , r.release_order_reg_date , c.drive_manage_code , c.delivery_member_id , c.release_order_car , c.drive_using_date FROM tb_release_order AS r LEFT JOIN tb_car_management AS c on r.release_order_code = c.release_order_code INNER JOIN tb_product AS p on r.product_code = p.product_code;
